name: Sharpsnmplib
body:
\#SNMP (SharpSNMP) Suite is a set of free SNMP tools based on an open source library for developers who target Microsoft .NET/Novell Mono platforms. It's developed in C# and can be used for VB.NET, Delphi Prism, and more. 

(C) 2008-2012 Malcolm Crowe, Lex Li, and other contributors.

This is the Git repository for #SNMP. Please visit our main site [http://sharpsnmplib.codeplex.com](http://sharpsnmplib.codeplex.com) for discussion and bug tracking.

### Install
[http://sharpsnmplib.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=KB&referringTitle=Documentation](http://sharpsnmplib.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=KB&referringTitle=Documentation)

### License
[http://sharpsnmplib.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=License%20Notice&referringTitle=Documentation](http://sharpsnmplib.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=License%20Notice&referringTitle=Documentation)

### Coordinator
Lex Li (support@lextm.com)
tagline: Sharp SNMP Suite - Open Source SNMP for .NET and Mono
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
